# Dependencies
node_modules/
npm-debug.log*
yarn-debug.log*
yarn-error.log*

# Runtime data
pids
*.pid
*.seed
*.pid.lock

# Coverage directory used by tools like istanbul
coverage/
*.lcov

# nyc test coverage
.nyc_output

# Logs
logs
*.log

# Optional npm cache directory
.npm

# Optional REPL history
.node_repl_history

# Output of 'npm pack'
*.tgz

# Yarn Integrity file
.yarn-integrity

# dotenv environment variables file
.env
.env.test
.env.local
.env.production

# Results directory (optional - remove if you want to commit results)
competitor-analysis-results/

# OS generated files
.DS_Store
.DS_Store?
._*
.Spotlight-V100
.Trashes
ehthumbs.db
Thumbs.db

# IDE/Editor files
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
*.swo
*~

# Temporary files
tmp/
temp/

# Puppeteer cache
.puppeteerrc.cjs

# Build directories
build/
dist/
